Trusted & secure 7.8 from 0 – 10 á Our most popular destinations Orlando USA from US$6 per day Los Angeles USA from US$7 per day Las Vegas USA from US$8 per day Frequently Asked Questions How old do I need to be to rent a car? With many rental companies, you must be at least 21 years of age to rent a car, and any driver under 25 may have to pay a Young Driver Fee. Similarly, people aged 70+ may find some companies will charge a Senior Driver Fee, or may not rent to them at all. So car rental for the under-25s or over-70s can be more expensive – which is one more reason to book with Rentalcars.com, as we work with all the big brands. Just check each car’s terms and conditions to see if your age would make any difference. Can I book a one-way car rental? Yes. One-way car rental deals are quite common, as they give people even more freedom to explore and enjoy their rental. However, rental companies will often charge a One Way Fee (or ‘drop charge’) to cover the cost of returning the car to its original location. As the world’s biggest online car rental service, we can help you find a one-way rental car with a low Fee – or no Fee at all. Do I need rental car insurance – and what is ‘CDW’ anyway? Before you buy any car rental insurance, you should find out what coverage is provided by your credit card company, your homeowner’s / renter’s policy, and your own car insurance. This will help you decide what cover you need to buy while booking and picking up your car. CDW means ‘Collision Damage Waiver’; a type of cover that limits your liability for damage to certain parts of a rental car. How do I find the cheapest car rental deals? As the world’s biggest online car rental service, we specialize in finding the cheapest car rental deals from major brands such as Hertz, Avis, Alamo and Budget. Daily, weekly or monthly car rentals… just fill in our search form to compare deals from different companies – and find out how much you can save when you rent a car from us. Any questions? content: AUSTIN ANTIQUE CAR SERVICE Weddings PromAustin Limo Rental Services Transportation Limousine Company Austin Limo Rental Services Evolved Home Rate Quotes Services AIRPORT ANNIVERSARY BACHELOR BACHELORETTE BREWERY TOUR CONCERT CRUISE PORT Homecoming NIGHTLIFE NON MEDICAL PROM SCHOOL EVENT TAILGATING QUINCEANERA WEDDING WINE TOUR Limousines SUV ANTIQUE CAR CADILLAC DEVILLE CHRYSLER 300 CADILLAC ESCALADE FORD EXCURSION H2 HUMMER NAVIGATOR LINCOLN 6 pax LINCOLN 10 pax Buses CHARTER BUS MERCEDES SPRINTER VAN 20 PASSENGER 25 PASSENGER 30 PASSENGER 35 PASSENGER 40 PASSENGER 45 PASSENGER 50 PASSENGER Service Areas Contact About FAQ Gallery News AUSTIN ANTIQUE CAR SERVICE Austin Limo Rental Services Transportation AUSTIN ANTIQUE CAR SERVICE AUSTIN ANTIQUE CAR SERVICE Our Austin Antique car service are unmatched. With literally hundreds of companies to work with we can offer the larges array of Austin Antique car service, Every make, Every model and discounts . We typically book Austin Antique car service for wedding transportation, prom transportation, homecoming transportation, Balls, special events, bat-mitsfas and quinceaneras but we certainly can use them for any event. When you book Austin Antique car service this also includes antique limos, antique vans, antique buses, antique limousines, antique suvs, antique transportation of all kinds. AUSTIN ANTIQUE CAR SERVICE VEHICLES As mentioned many times we provide 100s of vehicles to choose from and our antique car, antique limo, antique buses, antique coaches the case is no different. We have a wide selection of makes, models and years and we offer than at a discount. Feel free to fill out a quick quote and let us know what types of vehicles you are looking for. ANTIQUE LIMO SERVICE We provide Antique limo service for all of Austin and surround counties. We work with over 50 companies in Austin,. We have many Antique limo service vehicles to choose from and our Antique limo service provides enough capacity for 1-20 passengers. We have many non-Antique limo service vehicles that can provide up to 40 passengers capacity. In regards to larger non-Antique limo service we provide party buses that hold up to 57 passengers. When searching for Antique limo services have a look at our large selection by simply contacts us via text, email, call, chat or quick quote we are available 24/7 for Antique limo service. AUSTIN WEDDING ANTIQUE CARS We have years of experience in booking Austin Wedding Antique Cars. They remain a popular choice of getaway and photo car for Austin Wedding Antique Cars. We also provide wedding photography through our numerous photographers we contract with. if your looking for Austin Wedding Antique Cars to pit in your photos certainly give us a try. • Antique Rolls Royce Silver Wrath • Antique Bentley Rolls Royce • Antique Excalibur • Antique Madam X Bridal car • Antique Mercedes • Antique Ford • Antique Chevy • Antique Motel T • Antique Truck Austin antique car rental Austin antique car company antique car wedding rental Antique auto car rental service Austin Austin vintage car rental Austin antique vintage cars Austin wedding transportation services Austin wedding get away cars Austin antique old cars Austin wedding transportation rental Austin Antique car service AUSTIN ANTIQUE CAR SERVICE, Austin Antique vehicle rental, austin antique wedding limo, austin vintage car rental, austin rolls antique, austin classic cars á austin antique rolls rental service austin bridal antique car vehicles services austin bridal transportation services antique cars austin classic car rental service austin get away classic car rental services wedding austin old car rental service austin vintage car rental Austin wedding antique car service Austin antique car rental service austin wedding limo services FREE QUOTE IN UNDER 1 MINUTE Quick Quote Reservation Where to? * - Select an option - To: Airport From: Airport One Way Just Drive around Round Trip - - - or - - - Anniversay Bachelor Bachelorette Brewery Tour Concert Cruise Las Vegas (From SD) Night Life Prom School Event Tailgating Wedding Wine Tour Other Where to? Call Midway Car Rental today 1-866-717-6802 Home áá | áá Car Gallery áá | áá Internet Specials áá | áá Platinum Collection áá | áá Media áá | áá Contact Us Luxury Sedans | Convertibles | SUVs | Exotics | View All Exotic Sports Car Rental When you need a vehicle that rises above the rest, consider an exotic sports car rental. Far more than just a way to get from Point A to Point B, our sleek, luxurious fleet provides the ultimate driving experience. Whatever your driving needs may be, MCar will make sure you have a car that will go the extra mile. Los Angeles Exotic Sports Car Rental With 10 locations in Southern California, MCar is the largest privately owned car rental company in the area. If you need to rent a car anywhere in the Los Angeles vicinity and would prefer an exotic sports car rental, MCar will make sure you get it. Whether it’s directing you to our nearest location or shuttling you to your rental car from the airport, our courteous staff will help provide a smooth, convenient experience. We’ll even deliver your new, immaculate luxurious rental car to your office or hotel through our delivery program. Whether you've come into town on a commercial flight at the Burbank airport or zipped in on your private jet, we’ll make sure you get behind the wheel quickly. There’s something about sliding into an exotic sports car that makes you feel youthful and adventurous. Even if your visit to the area will be strictly for business, driving around in an exotic sports car will add a little bit of play to your work day. Imagine being able to drive your dream car for a week without having to make the payment. MCar's gallery of exotic sports cars includes convertible models like a sleek Jaguar (perfect for cruising through Hollywood). Or, feel the soft California breeze on your skin as you drive a Mercedes SL 550 or a Ferrari convertible. Renting an exotic sports car is the perfect way to enjoy living large at a fraction of the normal cost. Why MCar? MCar has been getting clients into their dream cars since 1970. We pride ourselves on providing an experience that brings new meaning to luxury. Our fleet of 2500 vehicles is always kept up to date, which has contributed to us becoming the car rental company of choice for several top studios and sports teams. Our personalized service is second to none and our online rental quote form is simple and speedy. Go ahead and indulge yourself during your stay with an exotic sports car from our elite fleet. No matter what brings you to California, we’ll treat you like a star during your stay. A valid United States or foreign country issued driver license; 2. A valid credit card, with sufficient credit available, embossed with the same name as the driver license; DEBIT CARDS ARE NOT ACCEPTED as a FOP (Form of Payment); 3. An additional credit or debit card embossed with the same name as the driver license. 4. One (1) of the following forms of government issued ID, in the same name as the driver license & credit card: Passport - United States or Foreign Country Issued United States Military Identification Card Foreign Driver License Provided - must be accompanied by a passport, NOTE : If a form of government issued ID is not presented, Hertz may consider the acceptance of an alternate non-government form of ID. Acceptability will be determined when the ID is presented at the time of rental. Hertz reserves the right to reject the ID as acceptable for qualification at its sole discretion and without explanation. If Hertz management rejects the ID, an alternate vehicle model will be offered for rental (pending standard rental qualification). An example of ID the Manager may accept includes a photo store member card (Costco, Sam's, etc.), a photo employee ID card, etc. 5. A return airline ticket or itinerary in the same name as the driver's license. If the customer does not have a paper copy, the manager will ask the customer to email a copy (e-ticket or itinerary is acceptable), for Hertz record to accompany the above forms of identification. If unable to email the electronic documents to the Location Manager, at management's discretion, it may be acceptable to view and make note of the travel information provided along with the required photo copied identification mentioned above. « Reg. U.S. Pat. Off. ⌐ 2015 Hertz System, Inc. content: Is Zipcar for me? Car sharing replaces car rental, ownership, and more Skip to Content Skip to Main Navigation Skip to Secondary Navigation Return to Homepage Main menu for everybody for business for universities reserve sign out Sign In Join Zipcar for business for universities our blog: ziptopia sign in Join Zipcar Main menu join! is Zipcar for me? how it works find cars rates & plans (Initializing...) Type in a location above, or select from the list below. (ex. Cambridge or 02139 or 10 State St, Boston MA) United States Atlanta Austin Baltimore Boston Chicago Dallas, TX Denver, CO Detroit, MI Houston, TX Los Angeles Miami Milwaukee, WI Minneapolis, MN New York/New Jersey Philadelphia Pittsburgh Portland Providence Sacramento, CA San Diego, CA San Francisco Bay Area Seattle Washington DC Canada Golden Horseshoe Hamilton Kelowna Kitchener/Waterloo, ON London, ON Ottawa, ON Toronto Vancouver Victoria Whistler Zipcars live in 50+ cities across North America and Europe. See all Zipcar cities. newest zipcar universities Gettysburg College University of Connecticut Mount Ida College Palm Beach Atlantic University Northern Virginia Community College (NOVA) Johns Hopkins University - Parent Santa Monica College Middlesex Community College Messiah College Union College Zipcars live on 100+ campuses across North America. Find your university. (Initializing...) (Searching...) (Searching...) Sorry, we are unable to pinpoint your location. There was an error searching for your address. Please try again later. You are here Home › for everybody › who exactly is the car-sharing type? Members use Zipcar as an alternative to the costs and hassles of owning or renting a car. But is Zipcar for you? See if you can relate to one of these situations. I want to save money. á Zipsters save an average of $500/month vs. car owners. Just imagine never paying for gas again. I take public transit, but need a car sometimes. á You love your bus pass but not for grocery shopping, longer trips or spontaneous adventures. Once in a while, I need a second car. á Does your hubby, wife or roommate have the car today? We’ve got you covered. I need a big car for a big job. á Reserving a Zipvan or SUV beats the heck out of renting a moving truck or asking your brother-in-law. I want to jumpstart my business. á Join Zipcar for Business . Use our swanky, non-branded Zipcars and handy Zipvans for meetings, deliveries or supply runs. I want wheels when I travel. á You can reserve Zipcars in other cities . Your Zipcard unlocks cars in major cities and airports around the world. I want to be kind to the planet. á Reduce your dependence on a personal car. If everybody does it, everybody wins. savings versus car ownership lose the car payment. keep the car Zipcar members save an average of $500 each month compared to folks who own and operate their own cars in the city. How much money [and stress] would you save if you never had to shell out for a car payment, insurance premium, oil change or gallon of gas again? Find out below. How much does your car cost each month? Car Payment 288 Insurance 84 Gas 100 License, reg, taxes 49 Maintenance 44 Parking 175 How much do you drive? Average number of trips per month 0 Average duration of each trip in hours 0 do the math $AMOUNT/mo $AMOUNT/year $AMOUNT/mo $AMOUNT/year The results: Zipcar can save you AMOUNT per month and AMOUNT per year. Sound good? Then start driving smarter! join Zipcar See how it works start over $AMOUNT/mo $AMOUNT/year $AMOUNT/mo $AMOUNT/year Not adding up? Consider this: A Zipcar membership makes a great second car for families. Sound good? Then start driving smarter join Zipcar See how it works start over where do you want to zip? Loading... compare to rental You could rent a car (but that would be silly). Car rental is great if you don't mind standing in long lines. Not to mention, you're usually paying for gas, insurance and parking. But that's not what the Zipcar way of life is all about. With Zipcar, you're free from paying for all three (they're included) and your Zipcard opens the door to any Zipcar in any Zipcar city – whether you're there for business or pleasure. When considering rental cars over Zipcar, it's helpful to play a little game of "OR": Stand in line and wait for your rental car OR Skip jovially through the city waving to locals and whistling, picking up your car around the corner? Pay for gas and insurance OR Pay a low hourly or daily rate that includes gas, insurance and mileage? Race back to the rental lot sweaty and panicked to return your car before 5:00PM OR Extend your reservation using your mobile device, and then finish enjoying your dinner? Listen to on-hold music for 45 minutes only to learn that the rental office is closed for the day OR Call Zipcar Member Services 24/7 and talk to a real person? Turn on the AM/FM radio and adjust the mirrors on the four door OR Reserve one of our luxury Zipcars and adjust to being comfortable. And happy. this idea is bigger than all of us Imagine a world with one million fewer cars on the road. We do. á Fewer cars. Way Fewer. Each and every Zipcar takes 13 personally-owned vehicles off the road. Multiply that by the thousands of cars in our fleet and you've got a really big number. The sharing movement. 10% of the population is expected to adopt car sharing as their primary mode of transportation. Why buy the car if you can get the gas for free? Driving smarter. After joining Zipcar, 90% of our members drove 5,500 miles or less per year. That adds up to more than 32 million gallons of crude oil left in the ground—or 219 gallons saved per Zipster. More green space. What would the world look like if everybody shared cars instead of owned them? Save paradise and tear down that parking lot. Want to make a real impact? Join the club.
